scripts.contracts: dotenv -e .env -e contracts/.env -- npm --prefix contracts run local:dev -- --export ../web/src/lib/contracts.json
scripts.contracts:deploy: dotenv -e .env -e contracts/.env -- npm --prefix contracts run deploy localhost -- --export ../web/src/lib/contracts.json
scripts.contracts:export: dotenv -e .env -e contracts/.env -- npm --prefix contracts run export localhost -- ../web/src/lib/contracts.json
scripts.contracts:fundingFromCoinbase: dotenv -e .env -e contracts/.env -- npm --prefix contracts run execute localhost scripts/fundingFromCoinbase.ts
scripts.seed: wait-on web/src/lib/contracts.json && dotenv -e .env -e contracts/.env -- npm --prefix contracts run execute localhost scripts/seed.ts
scripts.subgraph: wait-on web/src/lib/contracts.json && dotenv -- npm --prefix subgraph run dev ../contracts/deployments/localhost mainnet
scripts.subgraph:deploy: wait-on web/src/lib/contracts.json && dotenv -- npm --prefix subgraph run deploy ../contracts/deployments/localhost mainnet
scripts.staging:seed: dotenv -e .env.staging -e .env -- npm --prefix contracts run execute staging scripts/seed.ts
scripts.staging:contracts:export: dotenv -e .env.staging -e .env -- npm --prefix contracts run export staging -- ../web/src/lib/contracts.json
scripts.staging:contracts: dotenv -e .env.staging -e .env -- npm --prefix contracts run deploy staging -- --export ../web/src/lib/contracts.json
scripts.staging:subgraph: dotenv -e .env.staging -e .env -- npm --prefix subgraph run hosted:deploy ../contracts/deployments/staging staging
scripts.staging: run-s staging:contracts staging:subgraph web:prepare common:build staging:web:rebuild staging:web:deploy
scripts.staging:reset: rimraf contracts/deployments/staging && run-s staging:contracts staging:subgraph web:prepare common:build staging:web:rebuild staging:web:deploy
scripts.production:contracts:export: dotenv -e .env.production -e .env -- npm --prefix contracts run export production -- ../web/src/lib/contracts.json
scripts.production:contracts: dotenv -e .env.production -e .env -- npm --prefix contracts run deploy production -- --export ../web/src/lib/contracts.json
scripts.production:subgraph: dotenv -e .env.production -e .env -- npm --prefix subgraph run hosted:deploy ../contracts/deployments/production production
scripts.production: run-s production:contracts production:subgraph web:prepare common:build production:web:rebuild production:web:deploy
scripts.production:reset: rimraf contracts/deployments/production && run-s production:contracts production:subgraph web:prepare common:build production:web:rebuild production:web:deploy
scripts.// START : local development setup: This setup external service, setup subgraph and deploy it on the local graph-node, deploy the contracts and seed it
scripts.start: npm-run-all -l externals:down --parallel shell:common shell:web shell:externals:up --sequential common:build subgraph:setup contracts:clean shell:contracts shell:subgraph seed
scripts.dev: npm-run-all -l --parallel shell:common shell:web --sequential common:build subgraph:setup contracts:clean shell:contracts shell:subgraph seed
